publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6130 Shirley-Anne Somerville: National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month—That the Parliament notes that April is National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month; highlights that bowel cancer is the third most common cancer in the United Kingdom affecting both men and women; welcomes the Scottish Bowel Screening Programme, which invites men and women between the ages of 50 and 74 who are registered with a GP to undertake a simple home test; recognises the importance of this test as screening aims to find bowel cancer at an early stage in people with no symptoms as well as other changes such as polyps, and notes that information about the screening programme can be found at www.bowelscreening.scot.nhs.uk. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*, Elaine Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Christine Grahame*, Bill Butler*, Robin Harper*, Jackie Baillie*, Liam McArthur*
S3M-6130 National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 13 April 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Sarah Boyack*, Gil Paterson*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-6130 National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 13 April 2010) Jack McConnell*

S3M-6130 Shirley-Anne Somerville: National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month—That the Parliament notes that April is National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month; highlights that bowel cancer is the third most common cancer in the United Kingdom affecting both men and women; welcomes the Scottish Bowel Screening Programme, which invites men and women between the ages of 50 and 74 who are registered with a GP to undertake a simple home test; recognises the importance of this test as screening aims to find bowel cancer at an early stage in people with no symptoms as well as other changes such as polyps, and notes that information about the screening programme can be found at www.bowelscreening.scot.nhs.uk. Supported by: Aileen Campbell, Hugh O’Donnell, Bill Kidd, Joe FitzPatrick, Rob Gibson, Kenneth Gibson, Bob Doris, Brian Adam, Stuart McMillan, Elaine Smith, Nanette Milne, Christine Grahame, Bill Butler, Robin Harper, Jackie Baillie, Liam McArthur, Jamie Hepburn, Sarah Boyack, Gil Paterson, Hugh Henry, Jack McConnell, Maureen Watt*
S3M-6130 National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 13 April 2010) Linda Fabiani*
S3M-6130 National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 13 April 2010) Irene Oldfather*
S3M-6130 National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 13 April 2010) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-6130 National Bowel Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 13 April 2010) Ken Macintosh*
